001package org.krmdemo.techlabs.core.datetime;
002
003import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonGenerator;
004import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonParser;
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.DeserializationContext;
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonDeserializer;
007import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonSerializer;
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.SerializerProvider;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.deser.std.StdDeserializer;
010import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.module.SimpleModule;
011import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ser.std.StdSerializer;
012import org.apache.commons.lang3.StringUtils;
013
014import java.io.IOException;
015import java.time.Instant;
016import java.time.LocalDateTime;
017import java.time.ZoneId;
018import java.time.ZoneOffset;
019import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatter;
020import java.time.format.DateTimeFormatterBuilder;
021import java.util.List;
022import java.util.Optional;
023import java.util.function.Function;
024
025public class CoreDateTimeUtils {
026
027    /**
028     * Gets the current value of {@link ZoneOffset}, which depends on system settings of operational system
029     * and on the current time (because of <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Daylight_saving_time">daylight saving time</a>).
030     *
031     * @return the current value of {@link ZoneOffset}
032     */
033    public static ZoneOffset systemZoneOffset() {
034        return ZoneId.systemDefault().getRules().getOffset(Instant.now());
035    }
036
037    /**
038     * Transform the string-representation of {@link Instant}
039     * in {@link DateTimeFormatter#ISO_INSTANT ISO_INSTANT}-format
040     * into {@link DateTimeTriplet}
041     *
042     * @param instantStr string-representation of {@link Instant} in format like {@code 2007-12-03T10:15:30.00Z}.
043     * @return the instance of {@link DateTimeTriplet}
044     * @throws IllegalArgumentException in case of {@code null}, blank or any invalid string
045     *
046     * @see Instant#parse(CharSequence)
047     */
048    public static DateTimeTriplet parseIsoInstant(String instantStr) {
049        return new DateTimeTriplet(Instant.parse(instantStr));
050    }
051
052    /**
053     * Transform the string-representation of epoch-seconds into {@link DateTimeTriplet}
054     *
055     * @param epochSecondsStr string-representation of epoch-seconds (that is a standard {@code long})
056     * @return the instance of {@link DateTimeTriplet}
057     * @throws IllegalArgumentException in case of {@code null}, blank or any invalid string
058     */
059    public static DateTimeTriplet parseEpochSeconds(String epochSecondsStr) {
060        long epochSeconds = Long.parseLong(epochSecondsStr);
061        return new DateTimeTriplet(epochSeconds);
062    }
063
064    /**
065     * Parse the result of {@link DateTimeTriplet#dump()} or {@link DateTimeTriplet#dumpNoWeek()}
066     * back to original instance of {@link DateTimeTriplet}.
067     *
068     * @param dttStr the string with data-time in format {@value #dttNaturalFmtPattern}
069     * @return the instance of {@link DateTimeTriplet}
070     * @throws IllegalArgumentException in case of {@code null}, blank or any invalid string
071     */
072    public static DateTimeTriplet parseNatural(String dttStr) {
073        LocalDateTime localDateTimeUTC = LocalDateTime.parse(dttStr, dttNaturalFormatter);
074        return new DateTimeTriplet(localDateTimeUTC);
075    }
076
077    private static final String dttNaturalFmtPattern = "yyyy-MM-dd ['('EEE') ']HH:mm";
078    private static final DateTimeFormatter dttNaturalFormatter = DateTimeFormatter.ofPattern(dttNaturalFmtPattern);
079
080    /**
081     * Performs the subsequent attempts to parse the passed string {@code dttStr} with:<ul>
082     *     <li>{@link #parseIsoInstant(String)}</li>
083     *     <li>{@link #parseEpochSeconds(String)}</li>
084     *     <li>{@link #parseNatural(String)}</li>
085     * </ul>
086     * ... and returns either an instance of {@link DateTimeTriplet} or {@code null} if the input string is blank.
087     *
088     * @param dttStr the string in any supported formats (ISO_INSTANT, epoch-seconds, natural)
089     * @return the instance of {@link DateTimeTriplet}
090     * @throws IllegalArgumentException in case of the passed string is not blank and could not be parsed
091     */
092    public static DateTimeTriplet parseAny(String dttStr) {
093        if (StringUtils.isBlank(dttStr)) {
094            return null;
095        }
096        return parseFuncChain.stream()
097            .map(optFunc -> optFunc.apply(dttStr))
098            .flatMap(Optional::stream)
099            .findFirst().orElseThrow(() ->
100                new IllegalArgumentException(String.format(
101                    "could not parse the string '%s' as DateTimeTriplet with any of supported ways", dttStr)
102            ));
103    }
104
105    private static final List<Function<String, Optional<DateTimeTriplet>>> parseFuncChain = List.of(
106        parseOptional(CoreDateTimeUtils::parseIsoInstant),
107        parseOptional(CoreDateTimeUtils::parseEpochSeconds),
108        parseOptional(CoreDateTimeUtils::parseNatural)
109    );
110
111    private static
112    Function<String, Optional<DateTimeTriplet>>
113    parseOptional(Function<String, DateTimeTriplet> parseFunc) {
114        return str -> {
115            try {
116                return Optional.of(parseFunc.apply(str));
117            } catch (Exception _ignored) {
118                return Optional.empty();
119            }
120        };
121    }
122
123    /**
124     * Jackson-Serializer for {@link DateTimeTriplet}
125     */
126    public static final JsonDeserializer<DateTimeTriplet> DTT_DESERIALIZER = new StdDeserializer<>(DateTimeTriplet.class) {
127        @Override
128        public DateTimeTriplet deserialize(JsonParser parser, DeserializationContext ctxt) throws IOException {
129            return parseAny(parser.getText());
130        }
131    };
132
133    /**
134     * Jackson-Deserializer for {@link DateTimeTriplet}
135     */
136    public static final JsonSerializer<DateTimeTriplet> DTT_SERIALIZER = new StdSerializer<>(DateTimeTriplet.class) {
137        @Override
138        public void serialize(DateTimeTriplet dtt, JsonGenerator gen, SerializerProvider serializers) throws IOException {
139            gen.writeString(dtt.dump());
140        }
141    };
142
143    /**
144     * Custom Jackson-Module that provides serialization and deserialization for {@link DateTimeTriplet},
145     * which is useful to apply into {@link com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper}
146     *
147     * @return an instance of {@link SimpleModule} that provides serialization and deserialization for {@link DateTimeTriplet}
148     */
149    public static SimpleModule jacksonModuleDTT() {
150        SimpleModule jacksonModule = new SimpleModule();
151        jacksonModule.addDeserializer(DateTimeTriplet.class, DTT_DESERIALIZER);
152        jacksonModule.addSerializer(DTT_SERIALIZER);
153        return jacksonModule;
154    }
155}
